error.403.title: You are not allowed to view this page
error.404.title: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found
error.404.message: Please check your URL to ensure you are going where you intended. If everything looks OK and you still see this error page, please consider contacting the webmaster.
error.authentication.email: Your email address is not confirmed. Resend the confirmation mail.
error.honeypot: Your submission is suspected of being spam. Please reload the page and try again.
error.security.model.not.set: Could not perform the requested security action. There is no security model installed
error.unauthorized: You are not authorized to view this page. Please login using the form below.
error.user.found.email: Could not find a user with email address %email%
error.user.found.username: Could not find a user with username %username%
error.user.email.exists: This email address is already registered by another user
error.user.email.none: No email address set for the user profile
error.validation.date.format: %value% is not in the right format
error.validation.equals: Value should be the same as the previous field
error.validation.image: Uploaded file is not a supported image
error.validation.image.height.max: The height of the image exceeds %height%px
error.validation.image.height.min: The height of the image is less then %height%px
error.validation.image.width.max: The width of the image exceeds %width%px
error.validation.image.width.min: The width of the image is less then %width%px
error.validation.email.exists: This email address is in use by another user
error.validation.required.or: One of these fields are required
error.validation.username.exists: This username is in use by another user
label.active.user.description: Enable the credentials of this user
label.confirmed.email.description: Email address has been confirmed by the user
label.email.profile.description: Your email for password retrieval, notifications, ...
label.image.library.description: Library used to process images. GD should be always available, Imagick however has better quality
label.multiselect: Use CTRL to select more than one item or to deselect an item. Use SHIFT to select a range of items.
label.name: Name
label.name.profile.description: The name used when mentioning your profile
label.password.old.description: Enter your old password to confirm the password change
label.password.new.description: Use a secure phrase, best to use a combination of numbers and letters, capitalized and not capitalized
label.password.confirm.description: Repeat your new password to make sure you didn't make any typos
label.path.security.description: Each path expression should be on a different line. * can be used to match a path token, ** to match multiple tokens.
label.paths.allowed.description: Override the secured paths on a role level. Click on the name of the role to modify the allowed paths thereof.
label.paths.secured.description: Define the paths which are secured. These can be overriden with the allowed paths on a role level.
label.system.session.timeout: Time in minutes before a session invalidates
label.system.theme: Theme of the backend user interface
label.system.title: Title of this system
label.title: Title
label.unregister: To remove your account and all your profile data from our database, click unregister.
label.weight.role.description: When doing user management, one can only manage up to his own weight. The weight of a user is defined by the highest weight of all assigned roles.
success.cache.cleared: The selected caches have been cleared
success.cache.enabled: The selected caches have been enabled
success.security.saved: The security settings have been updated
success.user.email.confirmed: Your email address has been confirmed
success.user.password.mail: A mail has been sent to your registered email address. Click on the link inside the mail to set a new password.
warning.user.email.confirm: A mail has been sent to you to confirm your email address.
